_sText:
This is my 1st CS:S map. I hope you’ll like it.
	
Parts of building in the map are originated from 'Shanhua Police Station'. 	
It is located at southern part of Taiwan, Shanhua District, 	 
which is a dazzling building causing my desire to create a map for it. 	
Nevertheless, due to its gigantic size, I can't place the whole building in to my map, but only the front.
 	
idea: 	
A truck containing highly dangerous cargo is lost it control, and then brakes in front of the Shanhua Police Station. 	
Mission: 	
CT – To stop TR from exploding the mass destruction weapon in the truck. 	
TR – Plan a C4 bomb in the truck to explode the mass destruction weapon. 	
P.S. The trigger of the weapon is damaged by the crashing of the truck. C4 bomb is the only way to activate the bomb! 	
 	
I'm not used to custom textures. Probably there are some mistakes I guess.    If you could give me some advices, I would appreciated it. :)
 	
--------------------------------------------------- 	
Textures - Valve,     [cgtextures](http://www.cgtextures.com/ "cgtextures")

Special Thanks  	
tsukibosi 	
Text translated by hendychiang  	

Lastly, if bugs are found, please feel free to report us :) 
	
-------------------------------------------------	 
	
Modify  Version 1.1 	
This version has fixed bugs and done some optimized. 	
Added fog 	
Added Radar 	
Added BOT  
Fixed Bugs 	
Fixed lighting
